summary: This is an email chain from June 12, 2020, forwarding a subpoena tracker spreadsheet related to the Epstein case. It involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and an FBI agent, indicating ongoing legal or investigative follow-up activities.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the original email, working in the Southern District of New York, appears to be coordinating follow-up on Epstein-related subpoenas.

events.title: Follow-up call and subpoena tracker email
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email regarding a follow-up call and includes a subpoena tracker spreadsheet related to the Epstein case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 12, 2020, concerning follow-up on Epstein-related subpoenas.
It includes an attachment titled '2020.06.11_Epstein_Subpoena_Tracker.xlsx', indicating active tracking of subpoenas as of June 2020.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and an FBI agent, showing continued investigative activity years after Epstein's death.
